gate_name: Sprint 1 Quality Gate: Core Engine Security
criteria: Successful security code review of Jint sandboxing (TASK-002); All unit tests for sandbox violations passing (TASK-005); Encryption integration test passing (TASK-021).
success_metrics: Zero critical security vulnerabilities identified in the core engine.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: Script Management E2E
criteria: All API integration tests for script CRUD passing; E2E test for creating, editing (with Monaco), and deleting a script is passing; UI meets accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA) standards.
success_metrics: 100% of user story acceptance criteria for US-TRF-002 are met.

gate_name: Sprint 4 Quality Gate: Performance and Reliability
criteria: Automated performance benchmark test (TASK-007) is passing in the CI environment; All versioning and revert API tests are passing; Max dataset size guardrail is verified.
bypass_criteria: None. Performance is a key requirement.
success_metrics: Jint engine meets the 10s/10MB performance target.
